changeSet.author: pwadmore
changeSet.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES', 'U') IS NOT NULL EXEC sp_rename '${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES', 'LEGACY_TIMESERIES';

rollback.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.LEGACY_TIMESERIES', 'U') IS NOT NULL EXEC sp_rename '${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.LEGACY_TIMESERIES', 'TIMESERIES';
